s: Summary: Private MiCA Regulatory Masterclass for Web3 executives with limited seats and one‑on‑one with VD Law Group.
Topics: EU MiCA licensing, crypto‑asset service provider categories, token classification, cross‑border compliance.
Speakers: Sergiu Vasilescu (Managing Partner, VD Law Group) and regulatory experts.
r: Obtain actionable legal frameworks to accelerate market entry in the EU.
Direct consultation with a leading crypto law firm reduces compliance risk.
Position your project ahead of competitors by mastering MiCA requirements.
